Illustrate 1 Illustrate 2 Illustrate 3 Illustrate 4 Get the Food Wait TaDa! Here the magic Try Now
//content
Prepare the object food you want to identify.\nAs long as it is food and not obtained from stealing it should be fine.
After selecting the image via your camera or gallery. Wait a moment for the system to finish processing.\nThe process shouldn\'t last as long as you conquer the world.
Finally the result of your photo successfully processed and data from your food is displayed.\nUnfortunately only food data is displayed not your soul mate.
If you interested. Be one of the good people who have tried it.
//toast Camera Permission is Required to Use camera Image is on progress Failed send image to system Bad Request Internal Server Error
